items.title: Street Signs: F&O seismic shift, IPO fervour going strong, and more
items.description: The excitement in the initial public offering (IPO) market is set to continue this week

items.title: Govt to amend CPSE capital restructuring guidelines for dividend payment
items.description: As per capital restructuring guidelines issued, CPSEs that do not have plans to deploy their capital optimally for business purposes should have professional look at surplus funds available to them

items.title: Custodians plan to charge higher fee from foreign portfolio investors
items.description: Regulatory officials say gains from faster payout will outweigh increased costs
